beer.beer_description:
It’s just a helluva shock. Something that gets the adrenalin pumping like a 400 volt shot in a copper bathtub has to be good for the soul.

Join the hardcore elite, screw down the throttle and ride. Ride until your lungs bleed and your arms numb. Gun the fucker. Don’t pull back, or slow down until the crazy music starts.

Then sit, stunned, wall-eyed, open mouthed, in the realization this mother will drill you with Panzer-like efficiency. And you’ll beg for more.

Malts:
Maris Otter, Crystal malt, Caramalt.

Hops:
Centennial, Columbus, Simcoe / Dry Hops: Centennial, Columbus, Simcoe.

items.badge_description: Grab your hoppiest India Pale Ale and get ready to celebrate IPA Day! One of the most iconic and popular styles in the beer world, let’s all raise a glass in celebration!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 70 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 15!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 50 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 11!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 125 distinct venues!
Unlike The Highlander from TV, there are more than just one brewery in Scotland fighting the great craft beer war. Join the battle. No kilt required. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 40 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description: Happy birthday to you! Hopefully you’ll remember this tomorrow.
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 10 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 3.
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 5 Beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 2.
Unlike The Highlander from TV, there are more than just one brewery in Scotland fighting the great craft beer war. Join the battle. No kilt required. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 250 different IPAs. You have reached the top!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 45 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 10!
Unlike The Highlander from TV, there are more than just one brewery in Scotland fighting the great craft beer war. Join the battle. No kilt required. Try 5 more for Level 3.
